org.slc.sli.dashboard.manager.impl
Class ConfigManagerImpl

java.lang.Object
  org.slc.sli.dashboard.manager.ApiClientManager
      org.slc.sli.dashboard.manager.impl.ConfigManagerImpl
All Implemented Interfaces:
ConfigManager, Manager
public class ConfigManagerImpl
extends ApiClientManager
implements ConfigManager

ConfigManager allows other classes, such as controllers, to access and persist view configurations. Given a user, it will obtain view configuration at each level of the user's hierarchy, and merge them into one set for the user.

Author:
dwu

setDriverConfigLocation

public void setDriverConfigLocation(String configLocation)
this method should be called by Spring Framework set location of config file to be read. If the directory does not exist, create it.

Parameters:
configLocation - reading from properties file panel.config.driver.dir
